name: 2022 FORD MUSTANG SHELBY
body: Aptly called Predator, the motor is a supercharged 5.2-liter V-8 that summons 760 horsepower and 625 pound-feet of torque.

name: Porsche 911
body: Considering this is a luxury brand, this number says a lot of its reliability and driving performance. The Porsche 911 was recently hailed by J.D. Power's 2021 U.S. Vehicle Dependability Study as the most dependable and trouble-free car to own.

name: Ferrari F8 Tributo
body: It’s the stuff of which legends are made. Drama with a capital D. Ferrari’s F8 Tributo, the successor of the legendary 488 GTB, contains the most powerful V8 engine ever offered by the Italian automaker.

name: Aston Martin Valkyrie
body: The Valkyrie's hybrid powertrain consists of a naturally aspirated 6.5-liter V-12 and an electric motor. The Aston Martin Valkyrie provides seating for two. The cockpit is shaped like a teardrop.

name: BMW i8
body: The BMW i8 is a unique proposition in the luxury sports car market. A rival to the ubiquitous Porsche 911,the i8 brings a dose of eco-consciousness to the segment thanks to its petrol-electric plug-in hybrid powertrain.

name: Lamborghini Huracán STO
body: Propelling the Lamborghini STO is the 5.2-litre naturally aspirated V10 engine that produces a maximum power output of 630bhp and a peak torque of 565Nm.

name: 2022 FORD MUSTANG SHELBY
